      • setIcon

        public static void setIcon(InputStream... icons)
        Sets the icon for given size(s). Recommended sizes that you should put in are x16, x32, and x64.
        Parameters:
        icons - Icon(s) for the game.

      • setMouseGrabbed

        public static void setMouseGrabbed(boolean grab)
        Enables or disables mouse grabbing.
        Parameters:
        grab - Whether or not to grab the mouse.

      • setVsync

        public static void setVsync(boolean vsync)
        Sets whether or not v-sync is enabled.
        Parameters:
        vsync - Whether or not to use v-sync.

      • initDisplay

        public static void initDisplay(String name,
               int width,
               int height,
               boolean fullscreen,
               boolean vsync)
        Initializes the display.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the display.
        width - The width of the display.
        height - The height of the display.
        fullscreen - Whether or not fullscreen is enabled.
        vsync - Whether or not v-sync is used.
